summary: Onigiri: Purring with Magic, Spicing Up Every Adventure! - In the whimsical world of Kabosumama, where magic and mischief dance in the air, lives a delightful cat named Onigiri. Onigiri isn’t just any feline—he’s the spunky, purring sibling of the legendary Doge and the mysterious Tsutuji. With his sleek fur and twinkling eyes, Onigiri is the perfect blend of charm and charisma.
